message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product, and I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $110. What do you think?
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate it. I am willing to pay $95 for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob.  I understand you're looking for a good deal, and I want to make this work for both of us.  How about we meet halfway at $102?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Based on my budget, I can offer $100 for the product.
